title: UPGRADE : For a nondeafult group named cluster , port in use error on deploying an app after upgrade
description:
Steps :

Install server from 5.0.4 releases on 3 node cluster 
Rename the "Default" group to "Custom"
Add additional groups with the names: "Group2", "Group3"
Now do the upgrade on all 3 node to 6.0. nightly 
Try to deploy an oscar app .

Actual Result : Deployment fail with port in use error . Error stack below .Default port number appbuilder pull is incorrect .has not to be 8002 in this case that is clearly under use 

Work around : If i mannually change the port to the 8003 the app deployment works fine.
